flawed_nl_solution:
In 6 years, Jane will be 28+6 = <<28+6=36>>36 years old.
Dara will be half the age of Jane in 6 years, meaning she will be 36/2 = <<36/2=18>>18 years old in 6 years.
Currently, Dara is 18-6 = <<18-6=12>>12 years old.
Dara has to wait for 25-12 = <<25-12=13>>13 more years to reach the company's minimum age of employment.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
